Deciphered Text: The sacrifice must be from the blood of a heathen or the portal shall not open.
Enciphered Text: Lks asuzemcis gidc ds mnrg lks dupqa ng b gsblksr pn lkb rpnudc bgbdd opu qrbp.V

Deciphered Text: We believed that the jewelry box is in the wreck of the plane to the NW.  The wreck location will show up in the navigation system in our diving suits.  Watch out for the worms.  They are the precursor to an attack by a monster shark the likes of which you have probably never seen.  Find this box and throw it in the portal to close it.
